Notably, the Technology Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSEARCA:XLK) is up an astounding 52%.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:68 Chances: Oracle has been named a Leader in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Financial Planning Software and the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Financial Close and Consolidation Solutions, showcasing its strong position in the market. Oracle’s fiscal second-quarter performance benefits from a steady adoption of Gen 2 Cloud, Fusion, and Autonomous Database despite slow cloud revenue growth, indicating potential for future growth in these areas.
